summary: The diff implements a comprehensive synchronized Live TV playback system with a new LiveTVSyncPlayer component and backend time-tracking endpoints. All major requirements are addressed including server-side position calculation, looping logic, drift detection, program transitions, and initial sync on channel join. The implementation preserves existing VideoPlayer and Live TV features while adding synchronization capabilities.

hallucinated_features.description: ProfileSetupModal component for Internet Identity users to enter email addresses
hallucinated_features.reason: This modal component for collecting user email during profile setup was not requested in any requirement. The BuildRequest focuses solely on Live TV synchronization features.

hallucinated_features.description: BrandDetailPage modifications for content filtering and display
hallucinated_features.reason: Changes to brand detail page content organization (films, series, clips filtering) are outside the scope of Live TV synchronization requirements.
Modifications to series detail page for episode playback are unrelated to Live TV synchronization requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: UpgradePage Stripe checkout flow and admin redirection
hallucinated_features.reason: Premium upgrade page with Stripe integration and admin user handling is not part of the Live TV synchronization scope.
